verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
The fight is on, O Christian soldier,
And face to face in stern array,
With armor gleaming, And colors streaming,

verse.name: c1b
v1a
verse.lines:
The fight is on,
the trumpet sound is ringing out,
The cry “To arms!”
is heard afar and near;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The Lord of hosts is marching on to victory,
The triumph of the Christ will soon appear.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
The fight is on, A rouse,
ye soldiers brave and true!

verse.name: v2b
v3a
verse.lines:
The Lord is leading on to certain victory;
The bow of promise spans the eastern sky;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
His glorious name in every land shall honored be;
The morn will break, the dawn of peace is nigh.
